Ancestry-Human -- Male Versatile Human Cleric

Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh

Natural Ambition: Class Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Sanctification: Has neither the Holy nor Unholy feature
Versatile Human: General Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by Gozreh
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Perception: +5 (wisdom; trained)

Absalom Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Deception: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)

Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Skill Training (Carpentry Lore): Skill Trained (Carpentry Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: -1 on untrained skill checks
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gains +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 17 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity (1 max); untrained) Class DC: Cleric: 15 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Arbalest (+5 1d10 P R110'; dexterity; trained); Light Pick (+2 1d4+2 P [Crit d8]; strength; untrained); Longspear (+5 1d8+2 P; strength; trained); Shield Boss (+2 1d6+2 B; strength; untrained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Deity: Attack Trained (Trident)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Arbalest): Weapon Familiarity (Arbalest)
Underwater Marauder: Does not suffer off-guard or penalties from using bludgeoning and slashing melee weapons in water
Save: Fortitude: +4 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +5 (dexterity; trained); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Premonition Of Avoidance: (R) Gives +2 save vs. the triggering hazard
Stubborn Persistence: Successful DC 17 flat check negates becoming fatigued
Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 2; DC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Divine: +5 (wisdom; trained) Spell DC: Divine: 15 (wisdom; trained)
Spells:
Tidal Surge (D1 Foc): (1) R60' Moves the target 10' over ground or 20' in water (save Fortitude negates)
Zealous Conviction (D6): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary Hit Points, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will each rd while fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary Hit Points and +3 Will)
Magic Notes:
Cloistered Cleric: Spell Trained (Divine)
Domain Initiate (Water): Knows the Tidal Surge divine spell/Has a focus pool
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Adaptive Adept: Knows a cantrip or rank 1 spell from a second tradition
Cleric Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Deity: Has access to Gust Of Wind, Lightning Bolt, and Control Water spells
Healing Font: Can cast Heal at rank 1 an additional 4 times per day
Heroic Presence: (1) R30' Generates the effects of a 6th-rank Zealous Conviction on 10 willing creatures once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
